name: Core Control (Mikael Cedergren)
description:
Core Control is a single player arcade game inspired by Arkanoid and Space Invaders. Your job is to protect the core from the evil Arkanodians. Absorb the projectiles and fire them back to terminate the threat.

The Team:

Game Design: 
August Lewén
Dan Kärrholm
Jesper Westlund 

3D Artists: 
Alexander Blom LinkedIn
Alishia Nossborn LinkedIn
Benedict Gibson
Thea Falkenmark 

Programmers:

Miguel Gatsinzi
Mikael Cedergren 

Music/Sound effects:

Adam Wiger
